DataElement.preferredName: Collection Biospecimen Contact Information First Name Identifier Individuals Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:Information regarding the means of contacting a person or group._A word or group of words indicating a person's first (personal) name. (NCI):One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing._the name of an individual.

Concepts.definition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.
Information regarding the means of contacting a person or group.

Property.preferredDefinition: A word or group of words indicating a person's first (personal) name. (NCI):One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: A word or group of words indicating a person's first (personal or given) name; the name that precedes the surname.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
